verbose_text: This analysis that lungs from Pten d/d Smad4 d/d mice showed no expression of PTEN and SMAD4 in p63 positive cells in the tumors, while lungs from wild-type (WT) mice show expression of PTEN and SMAD4 in p63 expressing cells (XREF_FIG), indicating some tumor cells might originate from transformed basal cells expressing CCSP iCre.
